TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapDocumentMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 对方法应用 将指定发往该方法以及来自该方法的 SOAP 消息使用 格式设置。

span.span: Applying the to a method specifies that SOAP messages to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 为 XML Web service 方法调用操作的方式定义了两种样式，可以在 SOAP 消息中设置格式： `RPC` 和 `Document` 。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, which it calls an operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `Document` 指根据 XSD 架构格式化 XML Web service 方法。`Document` refers to formatting the XML Web service method according to an XSD schema. `Document`样式是指将元素格式化 `Body` 为元素后面的一个或多个消息部分的一系列 `Body` 。The `Document` style refers to formatting the `Body` element as a series of one or more message parts following the `Body` element. 和属性确定各个消息部分的具体方式 。Exactly how the individual message parts is determined by the and properties. 属性确定参数的格式是否为 `Encoded` 或 `Literal` 。The property determines whether parameters are formatted `Encoded` or `Literal`. 确定参数是在元素之后的单个消息部分中封装， `Body` 还是每个参数都是单个消息部分。The determines whether the parameters are encapsulated within a single message part following the `Body` element or whether each parameter is an individual message part. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 [自定义 SOAP 消息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). 此特性可应用于服务器上的 XML Web service 方法和客户端上的代理类的方法。This attribute can be applied to both an XML Web service method on the server and a method of the proxy class on the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 XML Web service 方法的消息样式设置为 `Document` `GetUserName` 。The following code example sets the message style to `Document` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method. 此外，具有 `Body` soap 请求和 soap 响应的元素的 XML 元素分别设置为 `GetUserNameRequest` 和 `GetUserNameResponse` 。Additionally, the XML element with the `Body` element for the SOAP request and SOAP response are set to `GetUserNameRequest` and `GetUserNameResponse`, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 默认值为 http://tempuri.org/MethodName ，其中方法名称是 XML Web service 方法的名称。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName, where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 属性是一个 URI，用于指示请求的意图。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the request. 不过，SOAP 规范不对 URI 的格式或有关 URI 是否可解析的任何规则施加任何限制。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format of the URI, or any rules about whether the URI is resolvable. Web 服务器（如防火墙）可以使用该属性的状态和内容来适当筛选 HTTP 中的 SOAP 请求消息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers, such as firewalls, to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 版本1.1 将 在 `soapAction` `soap:operation` 为 XML WEB SERVICE 生成的 WSDL 文档中的每个受支持的 SOAP 绑定的元素的属性中发布属性。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 W3C 网站上的 [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) 规范。For more information, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Action/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 方法正在为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: XML Web services 方法正在为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: 默认为追加了“Soap”的 XML Web services 名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义的绑定类似于接口，因为它定义一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 对于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services，每个 XML Web service 方法都是绑定中的一个操作。With respect to XML Web services created using ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web service 方法是 XML Web service 的默认绑定或应用于 XML Web service 的中指定的绑定的成员 。XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. 当多个属性应用于 XML Web service 时，XML Web service 可以实现多个绑定 。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings when multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 将一个或多个 特性应用到 XML Web service 后， 或 可应用于单个 XML Web service 方法以指示特定 XML Web service 方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置 或的属性 ，以指定 XML Web service 方法为其实现操作的绑定。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for. 只有一个 或 可应用于 XML Web service 方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，XML Web service 方法只能实现一个绑定的操作。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. 有关 WSDL 规范的详细信息，请参阅 [wsdl](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) 规范。For more information on the WSDL specification, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OneWay : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 客户端是否等待 Web 服务器完成对 XML Web services 方法的处理。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web services 客户端不等待 Web 服务器完全处理 XML Web services 方法，则为 。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web service 方法的 属性设置为时 `true` ，XML Web service 客户端不必等待 Web 服务器完成处理 XML Web service 方法。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. 一旦 Web 服务器对进行反序列化 ，但在调用 XML Web service 方法之前，服务器将返回 HTTP 202 状态代码。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before invoking the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 状态代码向客户端指示 Web 服务器已经开始处理消息。A HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，XML Web service 客户端不会收到 Web 服务器成功处理该消息的确认。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 单向方法不能有返回值或任何输出参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. 如果你使用的是 .NET Framework 版本 1.0 XML Web service 方法，这些方法 应用了或 特性 ，并且属性设置为，则无权 `true` 使用静态 属性访问。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property of set to `true`, do not have access to their using the static property. 若要访问 ，请派生类实现 XML Web service 方法， 并访问 属性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 XML Web service 方法，该方法不要求客户端等待 XML Web service 方法完成。The following code example is an XML Web service method that does not require the client to wait for the XML Web service method to complete. 因此，该示例将 属性设置为 `true` 。Therefore, the sample sets the property to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element beneath the element in the XML portion of a SOAP message.

value.span: 发往和来自 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 消息的 。

span.span: The for SOAP messages sent to and from an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例指定发送到 XML Web service 方法和从方法发送的 SOAP 消息中的参数 `PlaceOrder` 不会封装在一个 XML 元素中。The following code example specifies that parameters sent in the SOAP messages sent to and from the `PlaceOrder` XML Web service method are not encapsulated within one XML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ParameterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ParameterStyle/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ParameterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ParameterStyle/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求相关联的 XML 元素，该元素在服务说明中定义为了一个操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in a service description as an operation.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求相关联的 XML 元素，该元素在服务说明中定义为了一个操作。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in an service description as an operation.

value.span: 默认值是 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为时，定义用于包装 `Body` SOAP 请求元素下的参数的 XML 元素 。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP request when is . 这反映在 XSD 架构中，表示对 XML Web service 的服务说明中的 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 请求。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP request to the XML Web service method within the service description for an XML Web service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将与 SOAP 请求中 XML Web service 方法关联的 XML 元素的名称设置为 `MyCustomElement` 。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP request to `MyCustomElement`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在其服务说明中的 XML Web service 方法的 XSD 架构中使用。 is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method within its service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.RequestNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值为 WebServiceNameResult，其中 WebServiceName 是 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为时，定义用于在 SOAP 响应的元素下包装参数的 XML 元素 `Body` 。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP response when is . 这会反映在 XML Web service 的服务说明中表示对 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 响应的 XSD 架构。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP response to the XML Web service method within the XML Web service's service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将与 SOAP 响应中的 XML Web service 方法关联的 XML 元素的名称设置为 `MyCustomResponseElement` 。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP response to `MyCustomResponseElement`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在其服务说明中的 XML Web service 方法的 XSD 架构中使用。The property is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method in its service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 消息的 XML 部分中的 XML Web services 方法的参数格式设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter formatting for an XML Web service method within the XML portion of a SOAP message.
The for the XML Web service method.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义用于设置参数格式的两种方法： 和 。The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two methods for formatting parameters: and . 引用使用 SOAP 编码的格式化参数，如第5节中的 SOAP 规范中所述。 refers to formatting parameters using SOAP encoding, as outlined in the SOAP specification in section 5. 是指使用每个参数的预定义 XSD 架构格式化参数。 refers to formatting the parameters using a pre-defined XSD schema for each parameter. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 [自定义 SOAP 消息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例指定 `Document` / `Encoded` 必须将 SOAP 消息发送到 `PlaceOrder` XML Web service 方法。The following code example specifies that `Document` / `Encoded` SOAP messages must be sent to the `PlaceOrder` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.Use/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
